title: Shriram City Union Finance Extends Gold Loan Offerings In 7 North Indian States | Mint - Mint
content: Shriram City Union Finance Extends Gold Loan Offerings In 7 North Indian States | Mint  Mint
description: Gold loan products will be made available through 70 branches in Punjab, Rajasthan, Haryana, Himachal Pradesh, Jammu & Kashmir, New Delhi, and Uttarakhand.
